name: Defeat The Baby
description:
Ever wanted to commit child abuse and get away with it? Defeat the baby is your one two game Click the icons and mentally (also physically) destroy the baby this was made by my friend.

Defeat the baby is a flash styled game where you kill a baby. idk why my friend made this and i think he was drunk when he made this (JK). my friend wanted me to upload this to itch.io because he doesnt have a itch.io account. Hope you enjoy this!
